dictionary.lore: The Sentry Cane is a wand used by the high wizards of the ancient La Veda Republic that was destroyed by the gods. It holds the power of spirits of light and wind, and enhances the powers of wizards. It's said that its powers played a vital role in healing the soldiers wounded in battle.

usage.name: 癒宝ハートブースター
秘宝『ルディ・メクアン』
